data.description: Our Clinical Education team is seeking a summer intern to work alongside a team of innovative professionals and contribute to Atlantic’s mission of delivering excellent healthcare services to our communities. Responsibilities: - Assist with the onboarding and career path development of nursing students and nurse externs as well as entry level applicants who are interested in a health care career. - Support relationships with nursing schools and other educational partners. - Manage and update databases related to nursing student rotations (3,000 students annually, including 2,500 pre-licensed and 500 master’s-level students). - Prepare regular reports, including turnover metrics for nursing students and other key performance indicators. - Support the tracking and reporting requirements for the Federal Department of Labor Grant (5 year grant) including quarterly submission of participant database, narrative overview, and financial metrics. - Work with C-level executives on pipe...
